text: The tiny black Redemption dress Kendall Jenner wore to Vanity Fair Oscar party on Sunday, March 4, was everything. But earlier, the 22 - year - old slipped into a hospital gown after suffering a bad reaction to a vitamin IV drip, according to a Blast report published Tuesday, March 6. Sources close to the model told the outlet that she was getting ready for her Oscar weekend appearances when she tried the health fad that is supposed to make skin glow. But things didn ’ t go according to plan and Jenner checked into Cedars Sinai Medical Center in Beverly Hills, where she received treatment. Per the Blast, she was released a short time later.
